\### Abstract

Steps to Embed CKEditor 5 in this wbepage:

1\. Include CKEditor 5 Script Tag in Head of this HTML : Add the CKEditor 5 library in the \\\<head\\\> section of this HTML file using the yaml includes: in_header: static/html/header.html

2\. Create a \*\*Textarea\*\*: Add a \\\<textarea\\\> element where you want the editor to appear.

3\. \*\*Initialize\*\* CKEditor 5: Use inline JavaScript to replace the \\\<textarea\\\> with CKEditor 5 instance.

\<h1\>CKEditor 5 Example\</h1\>

<!-- Textarea to be replaced by CKEditor 5 -->

\<textarea name="content" id="editor"\>

\<p\>This is some default sample content.\</p\>

\</textarea\>

\<script\>

// Initialize CKEditor 5

InlineEditor

.create(document.querySelector('#editor'))

.catch(error =\> {

console.error(error);

});

editor.model.document.on( 'change:data', () =\> {

console.log( 'The data has changed!' );

});

\</script\>
